Data source: https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SH.STA.SUIC.P5?locations=IN
https://www.macrotrends.net/countries/IND/india/suicide-rate

# Analysis
```{r libraries}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

i
```{r}
ratetil2023 <- read.csv("data/ratetil2023.csv") 
ratetil2023$date<- dmy(ratetil2023$date)

Anyl <- ratetil2023 %>% mutate(date=as.POSIXct(date)) %>% 
  mutate(year=year(date))

```


Plot showing trend of suicide rates form 2000 to 2019 in India.

```{r}
ggplot(Anyl, aes(x=year, y=Total))+
  geom_line()+
  ggtitle("Suicide rate for India, 2000-2019")
```
